name: plain and simple baby socks
notes:
these cute little baby socks are easy to knit - worked flat, and then seamed

a lovely simple design, ideal for babies or baby dolls

instructions are included for 4 sizes ~ 2", 2½”, 3",  3¼” 

requires ~ dk yarn (around 6g, 8g, 10g, 12g) and 4mm needles

for a variation, add stripes, or a different colour on the top rib.


**to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below
↓**
